title: Monique Ellis Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Monique Ellis? Check out all of Monique Ellis's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMonique Ellis Content Marketing Manager Monique Ellis Monique is a Content Specialist at Similarweb. With over 7 years’ experience, she’s developed a particular love for data storytelling - and all things market research. Monique loves nothing better than crafting compelling content to help market research professionals navigate the digital landscape. The heart of her mission is to illuminate how harnessing the power of data can supercharge market research strategies. When not typing away, Monique is a keen bookworm (with a penchant for historical fiction), social butterfly and globetrotter. If she’s not nose-deep in a book, she’s off to a far-flung corner of the world to explore a new city or seek out some natural beauty.
